title: 03/17/2021 - HOUR 2 - Wilson, trades
itunes:title: 03/17/2021 - HOUR 2 - Wilson, trades
description:
The Bears offered a lot to try and get Russell Wilson but in the end got Andy Dalton

What sometimes goes on when players demands a trade?

More what the Broncos need to do to get Deshaun Watson



Guests: Drew Rosenhaus, Mark Schlereth

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
